citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:50am on
18-JAN-18.
The inspector was able to make contact with the Licensee by phone. She was able to confirm that no one was
available for inspection at that time.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:50am on
18-JAN-18.
The inspector was able to make contact with the Licensee by phone.  She was able to confirm that no one was
available for inspection at that time.
